Package ca.phon.ipa.parser

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    IPAParserErrorHandler
    Interface for implementing error handlers for phone lexing/parsing.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    IPALexer
    Tokenize IPA strings for an ANTLR parser.
    IPAParser
    Grammar for parsing IPA transcriptions encoded in UTF-8.
    IPAParser.base_phone_scope  
    IPAParser.phonex_matcher_ref_scope  
    IPAParser.prefix_diacritic_scope  
    IPAParser.prefix_section_scope  
    IPAParser.sctype_return  
    IPAParser.suffix_diacritic_scope  
    IPAParser.suffix_section_scope  
    IPAParser.transcription_scope  
    IPAParser.word_scope  
    IPATokens
    Maps individual glyphs to their IPA token type.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    IPATokenType
    Every IPA glyph must have an associated token type.
